title: Moderna's finance head is out as former employer conducts investigation - BioPharma Dive
content: Moderna's finance head is out as former employer conducts investigation  BioPharma Dive
description: Jorge Gomez, who officially took the CFO reinsÂ Monday, lasted one day on the job. His departure comes as Gomez's previous company, Dentsply Sirona, looks into financial allegations against current and former executives.
